Literature.Title: A designed antifungal peptide with therapeutic potential for clinical drug-resistant Candida albicans.
Literature.Author: Wubulikasimu A, Huang Y, Wali A, Yili A, Rong M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=18.5µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2002(MIC=18.5µg/ml),Candida albicans 08032815(MIC=18.5µg/ml),Candida albicans 08030401(MIC=18.5µg/ml),Candida albicans 08032815(MBC=92.5µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=37.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=37.5µg/ml)
